sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-row>
    <el-col :span="24">
      需求/项目：xxxxxxx  验收人：xxxxxxx  项目对接人：xxxx  状态：xxxx
    </el-col>
  </el-row>
  <el-table :data="projectList" style="width: 100%">
    <el-table-column fixed prop="projectName" label="业务中心"  />
    <el-table-column prop="dependTask" label="依赖/被依赖事项"  />
    <el-table-column prop="workHour" label="工时" />
    <el-table-column prop="Plan" label="排期" />
    <el-table-column prop="order" label="发布顺序"/>
    <el-table-column prop="status" label="进展/风险备注"/>
    <el-table-column fixed="right" label="操作">
      <template #default>
        <el-button link size="small" @click="()=>{this.$router.push('projectPlan')}">删除</el-button>
        <el-button text size="small">编辑</el-button>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
  </el-table>
  <el-row>
    <el-col :span="24">
    </el-col>
  </el-row>
</template>

<script setup>
/* eslint-disable */
import axios from 'axios'
import {onMounted, reactive, ref} from 'vue'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'

const dialogFormVisible = ref(false)
const formLabelWidth = '140px'

const projectList = reactive([])
const projectForm = reactive({
  projectName: '',
  proposer: '',
  checker: '',
  pm: '',
  status: ''
})

const fetchProjectList = async function (){
  projectList.splice(0,projectList.length)
  const result = await axios.get('/api/project/list',{});
  for(let index in result.data){
    projectList.push(result.data[index])
  }
  // projectList = result.data;
}
const createProject = async function(){
  const res = await axios.post('/api/project/create',projectForm);
  if(res.status == 200){
    ElMessage({
      message: '创建成功',
      type: 'success',
    })
    dialogFormVisible.value = false
    fetchProjectList();
  }
}

const initFormData = function(){
  this.projectForm.projectName = '';
  this.projectForm.proposer = '';
  this.projectForm.checker = '';
  this.projectForm.pm = '';
  this.projectForm.status = '';
}
/*onMounted(
    fetchProjectList
)*/
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
h3 {
  margin: 40px 0 0;
}
ul {
  list-style-type: none;
  padding: 0;
}
li {
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 0 10px;
}
a {
  color: #42b983;
}
.el-button--text {
  margin-right: 15px;
}
.el-select {
  width: 300px;
}
.el-input {
  width: 300px;
}
.dialog-footer button:first-child {
  margin-right: 10px;
}
</style>
